mapper.select: select bl.bcode, bl.bname, bl.btype, c.ctype, c.cname, decode(bl.btype, 2, 'reboard', 3, 'ticket', 4, 'black', 'board') controller from board_list bl, category c where bl.ctype = c.ctype order by bl.bcode

select p.mem_birth,p.mem_name, p.mem_no, p.mem_id, d.mem_email1,d.mem_email2,p.mem_state, d.mem_join_date,d.mem_tel1,d.mem_tel2,d.mem_tel3,d.mem_zipcode1,d.mem_zipcode2, d.mem_address1,d.mem_address2 from member p, member_detail d where p.mem_no = d.mem_no
AND p.mem_id like '%'||#{word}||'%'
AND p.mem_state like '%'||#{word}||'%'
select rownum,logtime,target from( SELECT to_char(logtime, 'yymmdd')logtime , COUNT(*) target FROM board GROUP BY to_char(logtime, 'yymmdd') order by logtime )
